title: Scenario development for the Waste Isolation Pilot Plant: Building confidence in the assessment
Scenario Forecasting: The Role of the Business Information Professional
items.abstract: <jats:p> This article examines the relationship between business information and scenario forecasting, and highlights the role of the business information professional in contributing to this form of forecasting. </jats:p>

title: A Study of Situational Variables in an Organizational Marketing Scenario

Oriented-scenario dynamics in information systems safety
items.abstract:
<jats:p>
            <jats:bold>A holistic and dynamic approach</jats:bold>
            is necessary to understand complex systems behaviour, where a single structural approch is too reductionist. Because Information systems present multiple interactions between hardware, software, and users,
            <jats:bold>risk is inside systems</jats:bold>
            , in the form of faults, and
            <jats:bold>outside systems</jats:bold>
            , when exposed to agents, directly or interconnected with networks. Thus, very few systems are completely free of risk; most of them are close to the limit, regarding certain risks.
          </jats:p>
